description.value: While raging, the barbarian can envelope herself in a cloud of smoke that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere and follows her as she moves. Creatures in the affected area must succeed at Fortitude saves each round or suffer the effects of breathing heavy smoke. The barbarian is immune to the smokeâ€™s effects, including vision obstruction. She can end this smoke as a free action, or it can be dispersed by wind in the same manner as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Fog Cloud} spell.
